mapper.insert: insert into tbl_cart(count, username, itemid) values(#{count}, #{username}, #{itemid})
mapper.select: select P.mainpictureurl, P.productid, P.productname, P.brand, P.subcategory, I.itemid, I.color, I.size, I.saleprice, C.count, C.cartno from tbl_product P, tbl_item I, tbl_cart C where I.itemid in ( select itemid from tbl_cart where username = #{username} ) and P.productid = I.productid and I.itemid = C.itemid and C.username = #{username}

select I.itemid, COALESCE(sum(count), 0) as totalcount, P.productname, P.brand, I.saleprice, I.color, I.size from tbl_product P, tbl_item I, tbl_cart C where username = #{username} and P.productid = I.productid and I.itemid = C.itemid group by I.itemid;
select count(*) from tbl_cart where username = #{username}
